item.description:
A pirate ship adventure!  The link to their website is below as is some info. I copied from there.  Please get to Rockport early enough to find parking and make your way to Tuna Wharf!  To avoid possible sickness I highly recommend taking 1 NON-DROWSY Dramamine 1/2 - 1 hour before boarding - why risk it?!  ha ha...  We can bring food and beverages (regular and alcoholic) so feel free to bring a treat or beverages to share!

Prices are:

$30 Adult, $25 Senior & Student, $20 Child under 13

http://pirateshipcharters.com/Welcome_Aboard.html

"History becomes alive and fun as the Pirate King (captain) gives commands to the crew to hoist the square sails and brace the yardarms all awhile telling stories as waves are gently lapping against the hull. Sailing along the same waters used for centuries by great sailing ships of an era gone by - Patriots, Privateers and Pirates - Oh My!

Your sailing experience will include crew dressed as pirates climbing the rigging and setting sail, telling stories about pirates, patriots and privateers along with the history of the harbor and entertaining our guest as much as they would like to be."

"Is there public transportation and/or parking nearby?

      The MBTA Commuter Rail ( www.mbta.com) comes to Rockport and is a pleasant walk to Bearskin Neck and Tall Ship Formidable. Metered parking downtown 25 cents /1/2hr (one side of street is 2hr limit and other is 5hr limit check meter)  There is a public parking lot with shuttle (every 20 mins.) on Rte. 127 coming into town known as Blue Gate Meadows Parking Lot on the Rockport Loop."
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet at the ship - pay as you board
item.name: Tall ship sail/picnic out of Rockport on a Saturday afternoon! Pirate themed!
